sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Car, MapPin, Phone, Mail, CheckCircle, MessageCircle, Calendar, ChevronDown, Clock, Award, Shield, Star, Users, Map, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react'; const ShafeerPortfolio = () => { const [bookingDetails, setBookingDetails] = useState({ service: '', bookingDate: '', carType: '', pickupLocation: '', dropoffLocation: '', phoneNumber: '', email: '' }); const cars = [ { name: 'Toyota Previa', image: '/api/placeholder/500/300', capacity: '7 Passengers', features: ['Comfortable Seating', 'Air Conditioning', 'Smooth Ride'] }, { name: 'Kia Carnival', image: '/api/placeholder/500/300', capacity: '8 Passengers', features: ['Spacious Interior', 'Premium Comfort', 'Modern Amenities'] } ]; const services = [ { type: 'Full Day Service - 800 AED', icon: , description: 'Luxury chauffeur service with discretion and premium comfort.', price: '800 AED', duration: 'Full Day' }, { type: 'Half Day Service - 400 AED', icon: , description: 'Reliable transportation with punctuality guaranteed.', price: '400 AED', duration: 'Half Day' }, { type: 'Drop-off Service - 150 AED', icon: , description: 'One-way transportation with professional chauffeur.', price: '150 AED', duration: 'Single Trip' } ]; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Booking submitted:', bookingDetails); }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setBookingDetails(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Shafeer TV

Professional Chauffeur Services

{/* Navigation */}
  • Services
  • Fleet
  • Book Now
{/* Services Preview */}

Services

{services.map((service, index) => (
{service.icon}

{service.type}

{service.description}

{service.price}
))}
{/* Fleet Preview */}

Fleet

{cars.map((car, index) => (

{car.name}

{car.capacity}

    {car.features.map((feature, i) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Booking Form Preview */}

Book Now

{/* Footer */}
+971 50 XXX XXXX shafeer@example.com

© 2025 Shafeer TV - Professional Chauffeur Services

); }; export default ShafeerPortfolio;
